mapper.insert: insert into t_push_member ( token_id, device_type, phone_num, loc_id, lang_id, longtitude, latitude, create_date ) values ( #{token_id}, #{device_type}, #{phone_num}, #{loc_id}, #{lang_id}, #{longtitude}, #{latitude}, now() ) on duplicate key update loc_id = #{loc_id}, lang_id = #{lang_id}, longtitude = #{longtitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, mod_date = now()
mapper.select:
select token_id, con_id, ( case member.lang_id when 1 then contents_EN when 2 then contents_JA when 3 then contents_CH else '' end ) as contents, device_type from t_push_member member, t_push_language lang, t_push_content con where member.lang_id = lang.lang_id and loc_id = #{loc_id} and con_id = #{con_id}
group by token_id
